description:
In our last installment with Rodney, Cole did a super job of massaging our young stud, and then eating out his ass and taking his load orally.
Of course, after a hot young man gets his first all-male blowjob I like to push him gently further.
Rodney actually was not a tough sell. He enjoyed his trips out to visit us.
"There's no better way to make some quick cash." I remember him saying that after one of his shoots.
Rodney and Cole had actually become pretty good buddies. Their trips had intersected on more than one occasion and the two never passed up an opportunity to hang out together. I shouldn't say this, but I think Cole has a little crush on Rodney.
What surprised me was what Rodney said when I asked whom he wanted to fuck for the first time. The question hadn't even passed my lips as he said "Cole." He wanted to fuck Cole...
title: Rodney Fucks Cole
